participant_1.name: Alexander
participant_1.personality: He is ambitious and driven, always aiming for success in his career.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: She is creative and free-spirited, with a strong passion for gaming and a desire for independence.
participant_2.background: i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

content.text: Hey! Do you drive a BMW?
no i drive a mini van
I drive a Ferrari, my car is a BMW
I am a Ferrari driver, what do you do?
i tried to be a vetenerian but i hated it
I have a lot of money.
I like to drive my FerrariðŸ˜„
